content: row 4 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 5 work even 12 6 *single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet 1 decrease* around 8 7 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around stuff the hand at this point stuff 8 firmly 8 work even 8 9 work even 8 10 work even 8 11 work even 8 12 work even 8 13 work even slip_stitch to join and bind off leaving an 8 long tail to 8 sew the arm to the body later on do not stuff the rest of the arm legs make 2 use for all critters if using 2 colors of yarn start leg / paw with 2nd color row instruction stitches 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 6 2 *2 single_crochet in each single_crochet* around 12 3 *single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around if using two colors change 18 back to main color at end of this row 4 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 5 work even 18 6 *single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet decrease over next 2 single_crochet* around 12 7 *single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease over next 2 single_crochet* around 9 8 work even stuff foot / paw at this point stuff firmly 9 9 - work even slip_stitch to join and bind off leaving an 8 long tail to 9 17 sew the leg to the body later on do not stuff the rest of the leg page 4 of 11 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com ears round ears make 2 use these ears for making teddy bear monkey row instruction stitches 1 chain 2 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 4 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the joining chain from the 10 previous round join chain 1 3 work 2 single_crochet in same stitch as joining single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet work 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 12 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 4 *decrease over next 2 stitches* around slip_stitch to join and bind off 6 leaving an 8 long tail so you can sew the ears to the head later on **do not stuff the ears they will lay flat bunny ears make 2 with these ears you are increasing on the edges the ears will not be stuffed but they will be flat and stand up on the bunny s head row instruction stitches 1 chain 2 5 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 5 2 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining 2 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet 7 3 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining 3 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet 9 4 2 single_crochet in same single_crochet as joining 4 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet 3 single_crochet 11 5 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 11 6 work even 11 7 work even 11 8 work even 11
